text: @NYGovCuomo @ChrisCuomo Our @GOP politicians think the old ppl who fought in WW2, Korea, Vietnam&other conflicts should drop dead of Covid19 so their grand kids can get a piece of the elusive pie they wont get regardless? Hmmm. Perhaps they dont deserve to inherit a trump economy. Open the golf courses!
